item.title: SNAP
item.description: score:-106 Chances: Snap Inc. has the opportunity to capitalize on the growing number of domestic users by focusing on expanding its user base. The company’s visual messaging application continues to be popular for communication through short videos and images, providing a competitive edge in the social media market.
